thread.title: WATCH: Shaq hits 3-pointer at LSU, the Tigers' best highlight of the season
thread.title_full: WATCH: Shaq hits 3-pointer at LSU, the Tigers' best highlight of the season

author: Matt Norlander
title: WATCH: Shaq hits 3-pointer at LSU, the Tigers' best highlight of the season
text:
1h ago • 1 min read 
Not only is LSU bad this season, the Tigers might have their worst campaign in more than two decades. At 9-15 and with just one win in the SEC, the program needs a serious reboot. 
But over the weekend, at least one cool thing happened. Shaquille O'Neal, one of the most famous alums in school history, stopped by. LSU built a statue for him, remember. 
Then he took a pass and cashed a 3. O'Neal only did this once in his NBA lifetime. . @SHAQ back at LSU, grabs a basketball and this happens... @WBRZ pic.twitter.com/NVn4O3pRdR — Brandon Saho (@BrandonSaho) February 12, 2017 
Shoutout to Shaq for wearing that Notorious B.I.G. shirt. Love it. 
Here's another angle on the triple. @JohnKincade your boy @SHAQ down here getting buckets at halftime in Baton Rouge. pic.twitter.com/FG7jwRb0U3
